committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the exchange of certain federal lands within the State of Utah, between the State of Utah and the Secretary of the Interior.
short_title: Utah Schools and Lands Improvement Act of 1992

summary.text: Utah Schools and Lands Improvement Act of 1992 - Declares certain lands in Utah to be part of the Navajo and Goshute Indian Reservations upon the completion of conveyance from the State of Utah and acceptance of title by the United States. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire such lands through exchange, subject to existing rights. Declares a certain tract of Federal land in Nevada to be part of the Goshute Indian Reservation. Bars the use of such lands for gaming or related purposes. Exchanges such lands without cost to the Navajo Nation and the Goshute Indian Tribe. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to accept specified school and institutional trust lands owned by the State of Utah within units of the National Forest System and incorporates such lands into the national forest in which they are located. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept all school and institutional trust lands owned by Utah within all units of the National Park System in Utah and requires the Secretary to compensate Utah for the value of specified acreage in Capitol Reef National Park. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to transmit to the State of Utah a list of lands or interests for transfer to Utah in exchange for State lands transferred under this Act. Authorizes the Secretary to offer to Utah a portion of the royalties receivable by the United States with respect to Federal geothermal, oil, gas, or other mineral interests in Utah which on August 1, 1992, were under lease, production, or covered by a permit to drill or plan of development or reclamation. Limits the amount of royalties offered. Sets forth appraisal, dispute, and adjustment procedures with respect to the value of such lands. Sets forth requirements with respect to transfers of title. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Utah Federal Lands Exchange Act of 1992
Utah Schools and Lands Improvement Act of 1992
A bill to provide for the exchange of certain federal lands within the State of Utah, between the State of Utah and the Secretary of the Interior.
